name: Bad Robot - Assembly Required
description:
The Bad Robot has fallen and is missing its components! It desperately needs to reach the surface to eliminate the human threat and all organics alongside them. Help it find missing body parts and return to the surface.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Rotate left and right
  • Z - Engage thruster
  • X - Engage grapple arm
  • R - Reset to last checkpoint
  • M - Mute audio
  • Q - Quit to main menu

Source code: https://github.com/cobear25/Bad-Robot
